entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning except minus 9 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning except minus 9 over southern sections. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 12 except minus 1 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over southern sections. High minus 12 except minus 1 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over southern sections. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
